item.title: SDL2, VMware, Linux and Relative Mouse Mode
item.description: So, one of my pet projects is a game engine based on a 3D Software Renderer (that I will post about some other day). One night, while I was working on it implementing an FPS camera, I started getting strange results when moving the mouse. My development setup for this kind of stuff consisted on a VM running Fedora XFCE Spin, where I would code using CLion, build and execute the program.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hey there! Welcome to my website! I know that this “Hello, World!” thing is really cliche, but I couldn’t miss the opportunity :P Anyway, seriously now! My name is Rodrigo Verdiani (aka Roverdi), and I’m a Brazilian developer. You can find more about me on the about section. On this website I hope to post some stuff that I’m currently messing with, but for the moment I’m still working on structuring this blog.
